alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 21 at 12:43AM MST until January 21 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST /9 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Kit Carson County. In Kansas, Sherman, Thomas and Sheridan Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST /9 PM CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of one to two inches per hour will lead to visibility of a quarter mile or less at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
